segments.text: At the Beijing Olympics , all four table tennis events were all-Chinese finals . A clean sweep again !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . All international ping-pong tournaments have become a demonstration of Chinese supremacy in the sport .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know any secrets to China's success ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In the first place , I think the whole nation is just fond of the game . It is well grounded with the mass . With huge numbers of people playing ping-pong , we can always spot a handful of potential world champions .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , the national ping-pong team must be a highly competitive membership .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . There is a careful mechanism for selecting players from provincial teams , and those lucky dogs have to observe strict rules .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They are subject to hard training . And you know what , for a player on the national team , personal affairs are supposed to take a back seat to training and competitions . They are not even allowed to talk relationships with each other .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , dear ! It's an encroachment on individual rights !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , ping-pong is our national sport , and we just have to keep winning one honor after another . That's why many people think such rules acceptable . After all , they are funded out of taxpayers'money .
segments.speaker: S2
